segments.text: This is Brown speaking . I'd like to speak to Mr.Tomas .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , but Mr.Tomas left here just a few minutes ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've been trying to call him for the last ten minutes , but your line was busy . Will he be back soon ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid not . He is away for the rest of the day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there any other way I can reach him ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid not , he has gone out of this town on business . May I take a message ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have a business appointment with him at ten o'clock tomorrow morning , but I'm afraid I can't make it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like to make another appointment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Unfortunately , I'm leaving here unexpectedly , and I may be away for several days .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . I'll tell Mr.Tomas you've called .
segments.speaker: S1
